title: AMD
body: <a href="http://www.theinquirer.net/?article=15029">The Inquirer has a nice read</a> about how Intel has been following AMD's lead over the past few years.  It's amazing how a much smaller company can <a href="http://www.theinquirer.net/?article=15043">still come up with superior technology</a>.  I guess that explains why <a href="http://finance.yahoo.com/q/bc?s=AMD&t=3m&l=on&z=m&q=l&c=intc">AMD's stock</a> <a href="http://finance.yahoo.com/q/bc?s=AMD&t=6m&l=on&z=m&q=l&c=intc">has grown</a> <a href="http://finance.yahoo.com/q/bc?s=AMD&t=1y&l=on&z=m&q=l&c=intc">significantly more</a> <a href="http://finance.yahoo.com/q/bc?s=AMD&t=2y&l=on&z=m&q=l&c=intc">than Intel</a> <a href="http://finance.yahoo.com/q/bc?s=AMD&t=5y&l=on&z=m&q=l&c=intc">over the past 5 years</a>.

bodyNavItems.text: Where does Adult Swim get its ironic and self-referential humor from?
